name: Super Administrator
description: System superuser with full access to all system resources and complete administrative privileges

name: System Administrator
description: System administrator with permissions to manage all users teams and resources across the platform

name: API Client (Free Tier)
description: Third-party API client with free tier access to public APIs

name: API Client (Pro Tier)
description: Third-party API client with pro tier access and higher rate limits

name: API Client (Enterprise Tier)
description: Third-party API client with enterprise tier access and unlimited rate limits

name: User (Free Tier)
description: Individual user or team with free tier subscription and basic resource access

name: User (Pro Tier)
description: Individual user or team with pro tier subscription and team collaboration features

name: User (Enterprise Tier)
description: Individual user or team with enterprise tier subscription and advanced resource management

name: Team Owner
description: Team owner with full access to all team resources and member management

name: Team Admin
description: Team administrator with member management and team configuration permissions

name: Team Member
description: Team member with collaborative access to team resources
